00020 require 'simbio_sqlite_result.inc.php';
00021 
00031 class simbio_sqlite extends simbio
00032 {
00033     private $db_name = '';
00034     private $res_conn = false;
00035     public $insert_id = 0;
00036     public $affected_rows = 0;
00037     public $errno = 0;
00043     public function __construct($str_dbname)
00044     {
00045         $this->db_name = $str_dbname;
00046         // execute connection
00047         $this->connect();
00048     }
00049 
00050 
00056     private function connect()
00057     {
00058         $this->res_conn = @sqlite_open($this->db_name, 0666, $this->error);
00059         if ($this->error) {
00060             parent::showError(true);
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00064 
00071     public function query($str_query = '')
00072     {
00073         if (empty($str_query)) {
00074             $this->error = 'Cant send query because query was empty';
00075             parent::showError(true);
00076         } else {
00077             $_result = new simbio_sqlite_result($str_query, $this->res_conn);
00078             $this->affected_rows = $_result->affected_rows;
00079             $this->errno = $_result->errno;
00080             $this->error = $_result->error;
00081             $this->insert_id = $_result->insert_id;
00082             // return the result object
00083             if ($this->error) {
00084                 return false;
00085             } else {
00086                 return $_result;
00087             }
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00091 
00098     public function escape_string($str_data)
00099     {
00100         return sqlite_escape_string($str_data);
00101     }
00102 
00103 
00109     public function close()
00110     {
00111         @sqlite_close($this->res_conn);
00112     }
00113 }
00114 ?>
